en.title: Front End Dev Journal: Job Hunting After Layoff
en.summary: Reflective notes on a front-end developer's journey after layoff, from mental pressure, self-evaluation, to realistic strategies in facing the competitive tech job market.

en.title: Gmail Secret: Check Username Instantly
en.summary: Practical tips to check Gmail username availability quickly and efficiently, complete with technical insights relevant for developers and users wanting to avoid repetitive trial-and-error.

en.title: Starting the Journey as a Frontend Developer
en.summary: The beginning story of becoming a front-end developer, discussing realistic steps, learning mindset, and expectations to understand before diving into the professional world.

en.title: Refactoring Study Case in React Js
en.summary: Refactoring case study on a React application discussing how to improve code readability, reduce complexity, and maintain system stability without disrupting production features.

en.title: Code in 2025: Klipxpert Trial Version
en.summary: Experiments and learnings in building the early version of KlipXpert, highlighting engineering approaches, video automation, and how AI-assisted development accelerates the delivery process without sacrificing quality.

id.title: Jurnal Front End Dev Mencari Kerja Setelah Layyoff
id.summary: Catatan reflektif perjalanan seorang front-end developer setelah terkena layoff, mulai dari tekanan mental, proses evaluasi diri, hingga strategi realistis dalam menghadapi pasar kerja teknologi yang semakin kompetitif.

id.summary: Tips praktis untuk mengecek ketersediaan username Gmail dengan cepat dan efisien, lengkap dengan insight teknis yang relevan bagi developer maupun pengguna yang ingin menghindari trial-and-error berulang.

id.summary: Cerita awal perjalanan menjadi front-end developer, membahas langkah-langkah realistis, mindset belajar, serta ekspektasi yang perlu dipahami sejak awal sebelum terjun ke dunia profesional.

id.title: Refactoring Study Case in React Js
id.summary: Studi kasus refactoring pada aplikasi React yang membahas cara meningkatkan keterbacaan kode, mengurangi kompleksitas, dan menjaga stabilitas sistem tanpa mengganggu fitur yang sudah berjalan di production.

id.title: Code in 2025 Trial Version Klipxpert
id.summary: Eksperimen dan pembelajaran dalam membangun KlipXpert versi awal, menyoroti pendekatan engineering, automasi video, serta bagaimana AI-assisted development mempercepat proses delivery tanpa mengorbankan kualitas.
